NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Medicinal products for acid related disorders
Medicinal products for functional gastrointestinal disorders
Medicinal products for obstructive airway diseases
Antibiotics and chemotherapeutics for dermatological use
Agents acting on the renin-angiotensin system

CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B03

SHORT_DESCR.P: Furnizare medicamente 5, conform caietului de sarcini anexat.

Autoritatea contractanta va raspunde, in mod clar si complet, tuturor solicitarilor de clarificare/informatii suplimentare in a 11-a zi inainte de termenul-limita stabilit pentru depunerea ofertelor, conform OUG 107/2017. Numarul de zile pana la care se pot solicita clarificari inainte de data-limita de depunere a ofertelor/candidaturilor: 18 zile.
